allow: Bash(sqlcmd -S localhost:1433 -U sa -P 12345678 -Q "SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE name = ''DriveLK''")
Bash(sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P 12345678 -Q "SELECT name FROM sys.databases WHERE name = ''DriveLK''")
Bash(sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P 12345678 -Q "EXEC xp_readerrorlog 0, 1, N''''Server is listening on''''")
Bash(sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P 12345678 -d DriveLK -Q "SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = ''drivers'' ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME")
Bash(sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P 12345678 -Q "USE master; ALTER DATABASE DriveLK SET SINGLE_USER WITH ROLLBACK IMMEDIATE; DROP DATABASE DriveLK; CREATE DATABASE DriveLK;")
Bash(sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P 12345678 -d DriveLK -Q "SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = ''Users'' ORDER BY COLUMN_NAME")
Bash(sqlcmd -S localhost -U sa -P 12345678 -d DriveLK -Q "SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = ''BASE TABLE'' ORDER BY TABLE_NAME")
